title: Parisian rose macarons
ingredients: ['For the meringue shells', '140g egg whites', '180g granulated sugar, divided into two bowls', '165g icing sugar, sifted', '165g ground almonds, sifted', '2 drops red food colouring', 'For the filling', '150g white chocolate', '50g double cream', '1 tablespoon rose water', '1 drop red food colouring']
